name: Shigure`s Google Arknights Theme

additional_info:
Recommend to use your own server to store pictures .
Regular expression is used to match url in such forms as "google.com","google.com.hk"

现在使用正则来匹配诸如"google.de";"google.com.hk"等网址
建议使用自己的服务器存放背景图
